summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1305, for the improvement of the alley in block 72 pf Terry's 1st Addition to the City of Seattle, the same being the alley between 8th Avenue and 9th Avenue, from Madison Street to Marion Street, by grading and bulkheading the same, in accordance with Majority Petition No. 30655, under Ordinance No. 14351 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
